reviewText: More fashionable then Asteroids!\nWe all know Asteroids, the super-popular arcadegame from 1979, I am happy to announce there is a better and more entertaining version of it called Cube Destroyer". Cube Destroyer gives you an epic nostalgic feeling which causes you to play for hours in a row.\nThe objective is simple
date: pass the level by destroying the villain blocks and spawners. But watch out; some of the blocks can shoot back!\nCube Destroyer could be considered a better game then Asteroids since it has way better graphics
recommended: no bugs and cool music!\n\nPros: Any non-acient PC can handle the game. If you want to check if you can handle the game
hoursPlayed: go to "canyourunit.com".[www.systemrequirementslab.com]\nNostalgic feeling which entertains you for hours.\nEasy
voteText: basic controls very easy to learn.\nPersonally I love the music
helpfulPercent: it suits the game really really well!\nCube Destroyer is very well balanced
votesHelpful: the levels are not impossible to beat but it is very hard to beat a level in only one try.\nWhen you die it is not a disaster
votesTotal: you immediately restart the same level.\nVery pretty backgrounds
votesFunny: great for the eye.\nPlaying this game will improve your reaction time slowly but steady.Cons: 75 levels
commentsCount: all very nice but also very similar. The levels get harder and get different enemies but I feel like this game is too similar to Asteroids as in gameplay.\nThere are no power-ups which could possibly make Cube Destroyer even better!\nThe concept of the game is not unique
column16: there are a lot of games with the same concept
column17:
nevertheless is this game still really good!
No sense of progression except for the fact that you move to the next (possibly harder) level.
Overall experience:

Cube Destroyer is an awesome game
column18:
I can guarantee you will have loads of fun playing this game! For just 3€ I would recommend this game to anyone who likes having fun!
If game will be too hard - you can use mouse scroll wheel to zoom out the camera. Good game!


Rating:

I would rate the game "Cube Destroyer" a 8/10!

reviewText:
Very good & simply game,

It's easy to control,it has good music,the different lvl's are balanced & the backrounds are pretty.

Here you're a cube which has to defend itself agaist other & often stronger cube.You finish a lvl when you eliminated all enemies.
With wasd you control the cube,with auf mouseclick you shoot & with the mousewheel you zoom/zoom away.You must avoid the enemies shoots, or the Level will restart.

I'vent met bugs.

It improves also your reaction.

& the best thing is: I made the 5lvl-card badge for it, got the heart emoticons 2-times,sold them bouth for 15€+.

12/10

reviewText:
I bought this game because it was .74 cents. It may have been a waste of .74 cents.

I have 13 minutes of play time. I played 8 minutes yesterday, and then got bored. Today I played 5 minutes, and then got bored.

There is a totally free game on miniclip.com called Super Awesome Tanks 2 that is a better version of this game.

Super Awesome Tanks 2: Upgraded abilites, Like 8 different weapons, upgradable weapons, FREE

Cube Destroyer: No upgradable abilities, same single shot weapon the entire game, not upgradeable, costs money.

I kind of feel like a fool for bashing on a .74 cent game but hey, you probably shouldn't waste your time/money. Go buy a candy bar or something.

RIP to the people who bought this game at full price.
